name: Huntsay
overview: We provide a comprehensive talent management platform to companies. This allows for an easy to use, end to end recruitment to hiring solution that will drastically reduce the time and cost of hiring, meaning, increased productivity and ROI. Our comprehensive talent management system means an in house talent pool to recruit from, recruitment marketing for 3rd party job listings, custom branded career pages, and a fully integrated applicant tracking system. Company recruiters will never have to leave our software. The advantages of an in house talent pool is that you can search for the candidates that you want, reach out to them and have them applied within our system in a matter of minutes. Furthermore, we will be offering a very unique social space that will help users and freelance entrepreneurs increase their exposure and self value.
